description: This source file defines the EstimationService class which provides a method to estimate vehicle range based on energy consumption and various environmental factors. It includes an internal method for efficiency adjustment and a public method for estimating range using input data structures.

classes.name: EstimationService
classes.description: A lightweight service for vehicle range estimation that adjusts efficiency based on speed, temperature, and wind conditions.

methods.name: float _efficiency_adjustment(self, speed_kmh: float, temperature_c: float, wind_kmh: float)
methods.description: Calculates efficiency adjustment factor based on speed, temperature, and wind conditions, with clamping between 2.0 and 9.0 km/kWh.

methods.name: RangeEstimateResponse estimate(self, req: RangeEstimateRequest)
methods.description: Estimates vehicle range in kilometers based on energy available, vehicle state of charge, and environmental factors.

ctags.name: _efficiency_adjustment
ctags.pattern: /^    def _efficiency_adjustment(self, speed_kmh: float, temperature_c: float, wind_kmh: float) ->/
ctags.signature: (self, speed_kmh: float, temperature_c: float, wind_kmh: float)
